entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 12:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
